messages.subject: Casey's little book  was: Re: letting kids do whatever they want
messages.msgSnippet: ... We second that!  My daughter and I read it together and we both quite enjoyed it!  Sparked my daughter into writing a little book of her own, though she
messages.messageBody:
>
> This is so cute! Thanks Mary and Casey for sharing it.


We second that! My daughter and I read it together and we both
quite enjoyed it! Sparked my daughter into writing a little book of
her own, though she hasn't yet told me what it will be about.

I may have to look into a freebie website for all these gems.
Perhaps a yahoo site would work, since we are all already here
anyway!

Jennifer
